list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase
list.description: Represents a Pokedex.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#allItems
list.description: Gets a list of all items.

list.description: Gets a list of all Pokemon species.

list.description: Gets a list of all species with the given name.

list.description: Gets a list of all species with the given dex number.

list.description: Checks if the DataManager has been initialized.

list.description: A dictionary of move effects, indexed by ID.

list.description: Finds a species by its dex number.

list.description: Finds an item by its name.

list.description: Gets a Map of items indexed by their name.

list.description: Finds an item by its ID.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#items
list.description: A dictionary of items, indexed by ID.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#listMove
list.description: Gets a list of Pokemon species IDs that can learn a given move.

list.description: Gets a list of Galarian Pokemon species IDs.

list.description: Gets a list of Hisuian Pokemon species IDs.

list.description: Gets a list of Legendary Pokemon species IDs.

list.description: Gets a list of Mega Evolution Pokemon species IDs.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#list_mythical
list.description: Gets a list of Mythical Pokemon species IDs.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#list_paradox
list.description: Gets a list of Paradox Pokemon species IDs.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#list_ub
list.description: Gets a list of Ultra Beast Pokemon species IDs.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#moveByName
list.description: Finds a move by its name.

list.description: Gets a Map of moves indexed by their name.

list.description: Finds a move by its ID.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#moves
list.description: A dictionary of moves, indexed by ID.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#pokemon
list.description: A dictionary of Pokemon species, indexed by ID.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#randomSpawn
list.description: Returns a random Pokemon species.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#randomSpawnPokemon
list.description: Returns a random Pokemon.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#speciesByDexNumberIndex
list.description: Gets a Map of species indexed by their dex number.

list.description: Finds a species by its name.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#speciesByNameIndex
list.description: Gets a Map of species indexed by their name.

list.description: Gets a Map of species IDs indexed by Pokemon region.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#species_id_by_type_index
list.description: Gets a dictionary of species IDs indexed by Pokemon type.

list.title: module:dist/models~DataManagerBase#weightedRandomChoice
list.description: Chooses a random element from a list of weights using weighted random selection.

list.title: module:dist/models~Evolution
list.description: Represents a pokemon evolution.

list.title: module:dist/models~EvolutionList
list.description: Represents a list of evolutions.

list.title: module:dist/models~EvolutionTrigger
list.description: Represents the trigger for an evolution.

list.title: module:dist/models~Item
list.description: Represents an item.

list.title: module:dist/models~ItemTrigger
list.description: Represents the trigger for an evolution that occurs when an item is used on a Pokemon.

list.title: module:dist/models~LevelMethod
list.description: Represents the method of learning a move by leveling up.

list.title: module:dist/models~LevelTrigger
list.description: Represents the trigger for an evolution that occurs when a Pokemon levels up.

list.title: module:dist/models~Move
list.description: Represents a Pokemon move.

list.title: module:dist/models~Move#calculate_turn
list.description: Simulate a fight between two pokemon instances

list.title: module:dist/models~MoveEffect
list.description: Represents the effect of a Pokemon move.

list.title: module:dist/models~MoveMeta
list.description: Additional information about the mechanics of a Pokemon move.

list.title: module:dist/models~MoveMethod
list.description: Represents a method by which a Pokemon can learn a move.

list.title: module:dist/models~MoveResult
list.description: Represents the results of a Pokemon move being used.

list.title: module:dist/models~OtherTrigger
list.description: Represents the trigger for an evolution that occurs under other, less common conditions.

list.title: module:dist/models~PokemonMove
list.description: Represents a move that a Pokemon can learn, along with the method for learning it.

list.title: module:dist/models~PokemonMove#calc_turn
list.description: Simulate a fight between two pokemon instances

list.title: module:dist/models~Species
list.description: Represents a Pokemon species.

list.description: Represents a change to a Pokemon's stat stages.

list.description: Represents the stat stages of a Pokemon.

list.title: module:dist/models~Stats
list.description: Represents the base stats of a Pokemon.

list.title: module:dist/models~TradeTrigger
list.description: Represents the trigger for an evolution that occurs when a Pokemon is traded.

list.title: module:dist/pokemonbase~PokemonBase
list.description: Represents a base Pokemon instance.
